profile.title: Bayanan Mai Amfani
profile.mustLogin: Dole ne ka shiga don duba saituna.
profile.filterExplicit: Tace abubuwan da suka dace kawai
profile.allowExplicitContent: Bada damar abun ciki mai tsauri
profile.saveError: Kuskure: ba a iya ajiye saituna ba
profile.noPrivateKey: Babu mabuɗin sirri a wannan na'urar.
profile.setBackupPassword: Saita kalmar sirri don kare madadin:
profile.backupDownloaded: An sauke madadin da aka ɓoye.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Shigar da kalmar sirri don wannan madadin:
profile.importSuccess: An shigo da mabuɗin sirri cikin wannan na'urar.
profile.importFailed: An kasa shigo da mabuɗin (kalmar sirri ba daidai ba ko fayil ɗin ya lalace).
profile.keysRotated: An ƙirƙiri sababbin maɓallan kuma an ɗora na jama'a.
profile.importKey: Shigo da madadin mabuɗin da aka ɓoye
profile.keyDisclaimer: Mabuɗin sirrinka ba zai bar wannan na'urar ba. Fitar da kwafi da aka ɓoye da kalmar sirri don dawo da shi a wata na'ura.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kana cikin shirin Kyauta — yi amfani da zaɓin Rana/Wata a ƙasa. Haɓaka don buɗe karin jigogi.
profile.backupTitle: Madadin da aka ɓoye & Daidaita na'ura
profile.backupDesc: Ƙirƙiri madadin da aka ɓoye da kalmar sirri kuma dawo da shi a wata na'ura don daidaitawa.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fadada idan manhaja ta fita daga hankali
profile.notifyOnCopy: Sanar da ni idan an kwafa saƙona
profile.loadFailed: An kasa loda bayanan mai amfani
profile.followHint: Labaransu za su bayyana a shafin bin ka idan suka buga ga masu bi (ko jama'a).
profile.userNotFound: Ba a sami mai amfani ba
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Wani kuskure ya faru a wannan sashe.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tura kira da saƙonnin da ke shigowa zuwa wayarka ko imel ɗinka da aka tabbatar. Kiran/fita zai iya nuna lambar Chatforia ɗinka.

chat.selectPrompt: Zaɓi saƙo ko ɗakin hira don farawa
